summary: COMPLETE LOSS OF BRAKING ASSIST ON 6/20/2017.  TIME: APPROX. 10 AM.  WEATHER CONDITIONS: SUNNY, 80 DEG F. SPEED: UNDER 5MPH.  WHILE MANEUVERING OUT OF A TIGHT PARKING PLACE (REVERSE THEN FORWARD), THE CAR HAD A SUDDEN COMPLETE LOSS OF BRAKING ASSIST.  THIS REQUIRED A VERY HIGH AMOUNT OF FORCE TO STOP THE VEHICLE.  AT FIRST, I THOUGHT THE ENGINE HAD DIED.  HOWEVER, IT HAD NOT. AFTER REVERSING TO COMPLETE THE MANEUVER, THE BRAKE ASSIST RETURNED TO NORMAL.
